power.name: Armory
power.text: Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Put any Weapons revealed into play. Discard the other revealed cards. You may active a power on a Weapon card

ul.li: Deal 2 projectile damage to a target
Destroy an Equipment card. If you do, deal 4 projectile damage to a target

card.name: Machete
card.power: Deal 2 melee damage to a non-hero target. If you have used the Submachine Gun power since the start of your last turn, deal 3 melee damage to the same target

card.name: Pistol
card.power: Deal 2 projectile damage to a non-hero target. If you have used the Submachine Gun power since the start of your last turn, play a card

card.name: Submachine Gun
card.power: Deal 1 projectile damage to up to 3 non-hero targets. If you have used the Machete power since the start of your last turn, destroy an Environment or Ongoing card. If you have used the Rifle power since the start of your last turn, put a non-hero target that is not a character card on top of its deck

card.name: Sniper Rifle
card.power: Select a target, (other than the villain target with the highest HP, unless they are the only villain target). At the start of your next turn, deal 4 projectile damage to that target. If you have used the Pistol power since the start of your last turn, draw 2 cards

card.name: Overdrive
card.text: You may use as many powers this turn as you have Weapons. At the end of your turn, destroy every Weapon card you have in play

card.name: Cover Fire
card.text: Deal 2 projectile damage to a non-hero target. 1 hero target regains 2 HP

card.name: Grenade
card.text: Deal 2 fire damage and 2 melee damage to a non-hero target. If you deal any damage in this way, destroy an Ongoing card

card.name: I Have More
card.text: Destroy a Weapon card. Destroy up to 2 Ongoing or Environment cards

card.name: Hail of Bullets
card.text: Deal 2 projectile damage to all non-hero targets

card.name: Armour
card.text: The next time Miss Militia would be dealt 5 or more damage from a single source, prevent the damage and destroy this card

card.name: I Don't Sleep
card.text: At the end of your turn, draw a card

card.name: Nonlethal Measures
card.text: Whenever you destroy a target, you may put the destroyed target on the bottom of its deck and destroy this card instead

text.small:
If you have used the Submachine Gun power since the start of your last turn, until the end of your turn, increase damage you deal by 1
If you have used the Machete power since the start of your last turn, deal 1 irreducible melee damage to a non-hero target
If you have used the Pistol power since the start of your last turn, draw a card
If you have used the Sniper Rifle power since the start of your last turn, destroy a non-hero, non-character-card target
